SELECT ba.id, ba.classify_id, bc.name classifyName, ba.title, ba.title_img, ba.author, ba.ori_flag, ba.publish_time, ba.type, ba.link_url, ba.remark FROM t_blog_article ba left join t_blog_classify bc on bc.id = ba.classify_id
and ba.id in( SELECT balr.article_id from t_blog_article_label_rel balr join t_blog_label bl on bl.id = balr.label_id where bl.deleted = 0 and bl.status = 1 and bl.code = #{query.labelCode} )
and ba.id in( SELECT balr.article_id from t_blog_article_label_rel balr join t_blog_label bl on bl.id = balr.label_id where bl.deleted = 0 and bl.status = 1 and bl.id = #{query.labelId} )
and ba.id in( SELECT batr.article_id FROM t_blog_article_topic_rel batr JOIN t_blog_topic bt ON bt.id = batr.topic_id WHERE bt.deleted = 0 AND bt.STATUS = 1 AND bt.id = #{query.topicId} )
order by ba.publish_time desc
